bibharṣi sattvaṁ khala-nigrahāya ca \|

sva-līlayā veda-pathaṁ sanātanaṁ

varṇāśramātmā puruṣaḥ paro bhavān \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** jana-saṅgraham āhuḥ, athāpīti
tribhiḥ \| **sattvaṁ** śuddha-sattvātmakaṁ rūpaṁ bibhirṣi \|
**sva-līlayā** ācāreṇa **veda**-**pathaṁ** ca **bibharṣi** \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : kāle** sajjanopaplava-samaye
\| varṇāśramāṇām ātmā niyantā tat-tad-dharma-pravartakaḥ \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :**
athāpīty-ādi---**sattvaṁ** saparātparatvaṁ **sva**-**līlayā**
**sva-janābhi-guptaye** **veda-pathaṁ** vibharṣi **varṇāśramātmā** san,
ato **bhavān** paraḥ **puruṣaḥ** puruṣottama eva \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** athāpīti yadyapi sṛṣṭyādy
arthaṁ raja ādi-guṇatrayaṁ **bibharṣi** \| tathāpi **kāle**
pālana-samaye sattvam eva guṇaṁ **bibharṣi** pālayasīty arthaḥ \| kim
artham? svajanāḥ sādhavas teṣām abhitaḥ sad-dharma-pravartanādinā
guptaye rakṣāyai ata eva khalānāṁ vadhādinā **nigrahāya** \|
**sanātanaṁ** tvad-rūpam \| tathā coktaṁ ṣaṣṭha-skandhe yamadūtaiḥ vedo
nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt \[bhā.pu 6.1.40\] iti \| yad vā, **sanātanaṁ** sadā
vartamānam \| ity avaśya-paripālyatoktā \| yad vā, ṣaṇu dāne sanaḥ
sarva-śreyodānam \| tam ātanotīti tathā tam \| ato varṇāśramāṇām ātmā
pravartako **bhavān** eva \| yataḥ paraḥ **puruṣaḥ** parameśvaraḥ
antaryāmitayā sarvendriya-pravartanena vicitrāvatāraiś ca
pāṣaṇḍādi-vighna-nirasanenāntarbahiś ca pālakatvam uktam \|
sva-sarva-jīva-hitārtham ity etat-pakṣe \| pakṣe **ca**---atha ataḥ \|
api eva \| ata eva \| **kāle** yathākālam \| **sattvaṁ** cittaṁ
**bibharṣi** dhatse \| kiṁ vā, **sattvaṁ** satāṁ vidyamānatāṁ
**bibharṣi** \| pratyakṣo bhavasīty arthaḥ \| svajanā bhaktāḥ \| khalāḥ
abhaktāḥ \| ata eva **veda-pathaṁ** ca bibharṣīti \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** yadyapy evaṁ
dustarka-śaktirasi tathāpi **kāle** svajanodbhava-samaye
**sva-janābhiguptaye** yaḥ **khala**-nigrahas tasmai **sattvaṁ** svayam
api prākaṭyaṁ **bibharṣi** tatra ca **sva-līlayā** varṇāśramasyātmā
pravartakaḥ san **sanātanaṁ** **veda-pathaṁ** **bibharṣi** puṣṇāsi \|
tad etad api duranvayam iti bhāvaḥ \| tac ca kiṁ vicāryaṁ yataḥ paraḥ
sarva-buddhi-paddhatim atītaḥ puruṣo **bhavān** \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** athāpīty-ādi \| satyam iti
sa parāparatvena prasiddhas tvaṁ svayā **līlayā** sva-**janābhiguptaye**
**veda\[pathaṁ** **bibharṣi** **varṇāśramātmā** san varṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ
āśramo gṛhasthaḥ tatra tatrātmā yatno yasya ātmā yatno dhṛtir buddhiḥ
svabhāvo brahma-vigrahe \| ity-ādi anyathā svajanānāṁ yādavānāṁ
bhaktānāṁ ca abhi-guptir na syāt \| vastutas tu **bhavān** paraḥ
**puruṣaḥ** \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tad anukaraṇaṁ ca
śiṣṭa-pālana-duṣṭa-nigraha-dharma-sthāpanādy artham ity āhuḥ---tribhiḥ
\| **athāpi** pūrṇa-parameśvaratve\'pi **sattvaṁ** śuddha-sattvātmakaṁ
rūpaṁ **bibharṣi** **sva**-**līlayā** svācaraṇena **veda-pathaṁ** ca
**bibharṣi** \| yato varṇāśramāṇām ātmā pravartakaḥ bhavāṁs tu paraḥ
**puruṣaḥ** tādṛśatvat svarūpeṣu madhye mukhyaḥ \|\|18\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.19 \|\|**

brahma te hṛdayaṁ śuklaṁ tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṁyamaiḥ \|

yatropalabdhaṁ sad vyaktam avyaktaṁ ca tataḥ param \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ata eva brāhmaṇeṣu bahumānam api
karoṣīti sa-hetukam āhuḥ, brahmeti \| **brahma** vedākhyaṁ **śuklaṁ**
śuddhaṁ **te** hṛdayam antaraṅgaṁ rūpam ākuta ity ata āhuḥ, yatreti \|
yatra brahmaṇi vyaktaṁ kāryam, **avyaktaṁ** kāraṇaṁ **tataḥ** paraṁ sat
san mātraṁ **brahma** ca tapa-ādibhir upalabdhaṁ tad **brahma**
\|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** antaraṅga-rūpaṁ vedo
nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt \[bhā.pu. 6.1.40\] BhagS 116 iti smṛteḥ \|
antaraṅga-rūpatve hetum āśaṅkate---kuta iti \| brahmaṇi vede \|
**tataḥ** kāryakāraṇāt \| **brahma** paramātmā \| brāhmaṇair iti śeṣaḥ
\| upalabdhaṁ sākṣād-dṛṣṭam \|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** brahmaṇo'pi parastvem
evety āha---**brahma** **te** hṛdayam antaḥ-karaṇa-rūpaṁ, hṛt ayate iti
hṛdayam \| **brahma** kīdṛśaṁ? **śuklaṁ** śuddhaṁ yatra brahmaṇi kāryam
**avyaktaṁ** kāraṇañ ca tapa ādibhir upalabdhaṁ sat sanmātraṁ tatas
tasmāt paraṁ paramaṁ padam eva tad ity arthaḥ \| yad vā, vyaktaṁ kāryam
**avyaktaṁ** kāraṇaṁ **tataḥ** parañ ca yat sat **brahma**
**tapaḥ-svādhyāya**-saṁyamair yatra tvayi upalabdha-matas tayy eva
**brahma**, **tataḥ**[^113] paraṁ na bhavati \|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** sanātanatvam eva
darśayanto vipra-kula-sammānane hetum āhuḥ---brahmeti dvābhyām \|
**tapaḥ** sva-dharmaḥ svādhyāyo vedābhyāsaḥ \| saṁyamo vratādiḥ \| taiḥ
kṛtvā upalabdhaṁ jñātaṁ sādhubhiḥ svādhyāyasya tapo\'ntar-gatatve\'pi
pṛthag uktiḥ prastāvānusāreṇa tad ādhikyāpekṣayā \| anyat tair
vyākhyātam \|

yad vā, vyaktaṁ svargādi \| **avyaktaṁ** nirvāṇam \| **tataḥ** **param**
utkṛṣṭaṁ śrī-bhagavad-bhaktyādi \| tattat sādhanam ity arthaḥ \| yatra
yasmin viṣaye upalabdhaṁ prāptam, āyur ghṛtam itivat athavā tapa ādibhir
viśiṣṭaṁ **brahma** viprakulam \| anyat samānam \|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** nanu gopayāny eva tān
svajanān veda-pathapoṣaṇena kiṁ tatrāhuḥ---**brahma** vedākhyaṁ śāstraṁ
tena śuddhaṁ kevalānugrahamayaṁ yad-dhṛdayaṁ tad-rūpam eva yatra
vedākhya-brahmaṇi **tapaḥ** sarvam anuṣṭhānaṁ svādhyāyas tad arthā sarvā
śikṣā saṁyamaḥ anyato mano-nivartanaṁ saha sat paraṁ **brahma** vyaktaṁ
jagat **avyaktaṁ** prakṛtiḥ tebhyaḥ paraṁ śrī-bhagavad ākhyatattvaṁ
copalabdham iti tat-poṣaṇenaiva sva-jana-poṣaṇam ity arthaḥ \|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) : brahma** **te** hṛdayam
ity-ādi \| **brahma** vedaḥ tava **hṛdayaṁ** hṛt ayatīti tathā tava
hṛdyeva brahmāsti tvam eva vedavaktā yatra tvayi vyaktaṁ kāryam
**avyaktaṁ** kāraṇaṁ sat vartamānaṁ **tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṁyamaiḥ** saha
upalabdham kīdṛśam **avyaktaṁ** **śuklaṁ** śuddhaṁ **tataḥ** paraṁ
vyaktāvyaktayoḥ paraṁ **brahma** tvayy evopalabdhaṁ tvad-bhinnam etad
ity arthaḥ \|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** yato vedas tava priyaḥ
ity āhuḥ---**brahma** vedākhyaṁ **śuklaṁ** śuddhaṁ **te** **hṛdayaṁ**
yatra brahmaṇi vyaktaṁ kāryam **avyaktaṁ** kāraṇaṁ **tataḥ** paraṁ
sanmātraṁ **brahma** ca tapa-ādibhir upalabdham \|\|19\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.20 \|\|**

tasmād brahma-kulaṁ brahman śāstra-yones tvam ātmanaḥ \|

sabhājayasi sad dhāma tad brahmaṇyāgraṇīr bhavān \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tasmād** deda-hṛdayatvād
veda-pravartakaṁ brāhmaṇa-**kulaṁ śāstra**-yoner veda-pramāṇakasya tava
sad-**dhāma** śreṣṭham upalabdhi-sthānaṁ **sabhājayasi** saṁpūjayasi tat
**tasmād** eva kāraṇāt tvaṁ brahmaṇyānām agraṇīr mukhyas tat pravartakaḥ
san karmācarasīty arthaḥ \|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** upalabdhi-sthānaṁ
brāhmaṇa-kulam \| brāhmaṇa-kule eva tvaṁ labhyase\'nyeṣām api
tavopalabdhir **brahma-**dvāraiva tasyaivopadeśādhikārāt \|
brāhmaṇasyaivādhikāro dharma-mātropadeśane iti saṁhitokteḥ \|
tat-**tasmād-**brāhmaṇa-kulasa-bhājanād eva \| tat-pravartako
veda-mārga-pravartakaḥ \| ity artha iti---

> yadi hy ahaṁ na varteyaṁ jātu karmaṇyatandritaḥ \|
>
> mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ \|\|

iti śrī-mukhokter iti bhāvaḥ \|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** ātmanas tava sat utkṛṣṭam
**dhāma** adhiṣṭhānam\| tatra hetuḥ---**śāstra-**yoner
veda-pravartakasya veda-pratipādyasya vā \| kiṁ ca, \| he **brahmann**
iti vedaḥ sākṣāt**-tvam** eveti bhāvaḥ \| īdṛśa-vedasya dhāraṇāt
pravartanāt ca **sad-dhāma** \| ataḥ sabhājanaṁ yuktam eveti tātparyam
\|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** nanu bhavatvevam api yuṣmān
kathaṁ pūjayāmi tatrāhuḥ---**tasmād** iti \| **tad** evaṁ loka-saṅgraha
iti yathopakrāntaṁ tathaivopasaṁhṛtam iti bhāvaḥ \|\|20\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : śāstra-**yoner
veda-pramāṇasya **ātmanaḥ** svasya **sad**-**dhāma** śreṣṭham
upalabdhi-sthānaṁ **brahma-kulaṁ sabhājayasi** pūjayasi \|\|20\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.21 \|\|**

adya no janma-sāphalyaṁ vidyāyās tapaso dṛśaḥ \|

tvayā saṅgamya sad-gatyā yad antaḥ śreyasāṁ paraḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tasmād īśvarasya tavedaṁ
jana-saṅgraha-mātraṁ, vayaṁ tu tava saṅgatyā kṛtārthī ity āhuḥ---adyeti
ṣaḍbhiḥ \| satāṁ **gatyā** **tvayā** **saṅgamya** saṅgaṁ prāpya \| yad
yasmāt tvaṁ **śreyasāṁ** paro'va[^114]dhiḥ \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yatas tvaṁ
veda-pravartakas tasmād ity arthaḥ \| **gatyā** prāpyena \| na kevalaṁ
janmana eva **sāphalyaṁ** kintu vidyāder apīty āha---vidyāyā iti \|

sā vidyā tan-matir yayā \[4.29.49\],

tat tapo yad dhareḥ priyam \[\]

tad eva yat paśyati tad dhi cakṣuḥ \[10.80.4\] ity-ādy ukteḥ \|

sāphalyam iti samāsāntar-gatam apy anyatrānveti bhīṣma-droṇa-pramukhataḥ
sarveṣāṁ ca mahīkṣitām itivat \| **śreyasāṁ** kalyāṇānāṁ śreyo muktau
śubhe dharme\'tipraśaste ca vācyavat iti medinī \| paro\'vadhiḥ \|
śreyasām iha sarveṣām ātmā hy avadhir arthataḥ \| ity ukteḥ \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** yad **antaḥ**
**śreyasāṁ** **paraḥ** paro bhāgaḥ yatas tvem eva anto'vadhibhūta ity
arthaḥ \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** janmanaḥ **sāphalyaṁ**
vidyādīnāṁ ca **sāphalyaṁ** vṛttam \| yad vā, adyaiva janmābhūt,
**janma**-phalodayāt \| anyathā janmano vaiyarthyenābhāve paryavasānam
iti bhavaḥ \| janmādīnāṁ yathottaraṁ phalaṁ ca tatra **tapaso**
dṛk-phalakatvam \| dṛk-phala-bhagavat-sākṣātkāra-siddhyaiva samyak
tat-phala-siddheḥ \| satāṁ bhaktānām eva **gatyā** prāpyeṇa **paraḥ**
paramo\'nto\'vadhiḥ \| anyat tair vyākhyātam \|

yad vā, **śreyasāṁ** phalānāṁ madhye para utkṛṣṭas tvat-pādābja-premā
yad anto yan-niṣṭhaḥ yat-prasādāllabhyata ity arthaḥ \| anyat samānam
\|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** bhavatv evaṁ nāma kim asmākam
acintya-cintanena samprati svahṛdayānandam eva nivedayām ety
āśayenāhuḥ---adyeti adyety ajahal-lakṣaṇayā etādṛśe svayaṁ bhagavato
bhavataḥ prakāśasamaye avatīrṇau kilādya me \[bhā.pu. 10.85.30\] iti
vakṣyamāṇa-śrī-devakī-vacanāt evam adyaiva no\'smākaṁ
**janma-sāphalyaṁ** vṛttaṁ tathāsmākaṁ vidyāyāḥ vedādy abhyāsasya
tapasas tato jātasya parokṣa-jñānasya dṛśaś cāparokṣa-jñānasya
**janma-sāphalyaṁ** jātaṁ kiṁ kṛtvā **tvayā** satāṁ viduṣāṁ **gatyā**
paramāśrayeṇa saha saṅgatya militvā \|

nanu bhavanto brahmānubhavinaḥ vicitramad-āvirbhāvānāṁ draṣṭāraś ca
kathaṁ mamaivāvirbhāva-samaye janmādi-**sāphalyaṁ** varṇayatha
tatrāhuḥ---yat ya eva **śreyasāṁ** sarva-puruṣārthānāṁ paro\'taḥ
paramāvadhir iti tathā ca śrī-mad uddhava-vacanaṁ
yan-martya-līlaupayikam \[bhā.pu. 3.2.12\] ity-ādi \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** adyeti \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yad **antaḥ-śreyasāṁ** para
iti **śreyasāṁ** **paraḥ** paro bhāgyo **yadantaḥ** yaḥ svayam eva
tvat-saṅgo vā anto\'vadhir ity arthaḥ \|\|21-29\|\|

**prīti-sandarbha 78:** atha śrī-kṛṣṇe svayaṁ bhagavaty
evāvirbhāva-pūrṇatva-darśanena tasyāḥ pūrṇatvaṁ darśayati---adyeti \|
satāṁ tvad-eka-niṣṭhānāṁ tad-viśeṣāṇāṁ **gatyā** **tvayā**
śrī-kṛṣṇa-ākhyena **saṅgamya** no'smākaṁ
vaśiṣṭha-catuḥ-sana-vāmadeva-mārkaṇḍeya-nārada-kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyanādīnāṁ
brahmānubhavatāṁ bhagavadīya-nānā-bhakti-rasa-vidāṁ
dṛṣṭa-nānā-bhagavad-āvirbhāvānām api **adya**
īdṛśa-prākaṭyāvacchinne'sminn evāvasare janmanaḥ **sāphalyaṁ** jātam \|
yad eva **sāphalyaṁ** pūrva-labdhānāṁ
tat-tad-āvirbhāva-jāta-tat-tat-sāphalya-rūpāṇāṁ **śreyasāṁ**
parama-puruṣārthānāṁ paro'ntaraḥ paramo'vadhir iti \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tvayā** **sadgatyā**
**sad-**gati-svarūpeṇa saha **saṅgamya** saṅgaṁ prāpya vartamānānāṁ
no\'smākaṁ vidyādi**-sāphalyaṁ** yat yasmāt tvaṁ śreyesāṁ **paraḥ**
anto\'vadhiḥ sīmā \|\|21\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.22 \|\|**

namas tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase \|

sva-yogamāya[^115]yācchanna-mahimne paramātmane \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tasmād īśvarasya tavedaṁ
jana-saṅgraha-mātraṁ, vayaṁ tu tava saṅgatyā kṛtārthā ity āhuḥ, adyeti
ṣaḍbhiḥ \| satāṁ gatyā tvayā saṅgamya saṅgaṁ prāpya \| yad yasmāt tvaṁ
śreyasāṁ paro'vadhiḥ \|\|22\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** mahimā svarūpam \|\|22\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** evam ātma-mahā-dhanyatām
ananena bhakty udrekāt praṇamanti-nama iti \| tubhyam iti śeṣaḥ \|
sākṣāt-tad anuktir bhakti-bharodayād eva \| svakīyayā asādhāraṇayā
yoga-māyayāpi na channo nāvṛto mahimā yasya **tasmai** \|
aśeṣaiśvarya-prakaṭanāt \| svayoga-māyayācchanno mahimā yeneti vā \| yad
vā, svena tayā yogo bhaktānāṁ saṁyogo yayā māyayā kṛpayā kṛtvā
acchanna-**mahimne** \| ata eva **paramātmane** sarveṣāṁ
parama-priyatamāya \|\|22\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** evaṁ
tan-māhātmyabhara-camatkāreṇa bhakty udrekāt-praṇamanti nanu iti \|
tubhyam iti śeṣaḥ \| sākṣāt-tad anukti-bhaktibharodayād eva **tasmai**
sarvāgocarāya yato **bhagavate** kṛṣṇāya sarvato\'parāya ity arthaḥ \|
svayaṁ tv akuṇṭha-**medhase** sadā sarvatrānavacchinna-jñānāya evaṁ
cettarhi katham atra nityam eva na tiṣṭhatha tatrāhuḥ---svayogeti \|

nāhaṁ prakāśaḥ sarvasya yoga-māyā-samāvṛtaḥ \[gī. 7.25\] \| iti nyāyena
yan-māyayā tattva-viduttamā vayaṁ vimohitaḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.84.16\] \| ity
uktarītyā ca naitādṛśaṁ jñānaṁ sadā tiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ \| tarhy adhunā
kathaṁ jātaṁ tatrāhuḥ---**paramātmane** iti \| tavaivānugrahamayā
preraṇayeti bhāvaḥ \|\|22\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tasmāt tvaṁ
loka-saṅgrahārtham asmān stuhi praṇama vā vayaṁ tu tvām iṣṭa-devaṁ
**namas** kurma eveti praṇamanti---nama iti \|\|22\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.23 \|\|**

na yaṁ[^116] vidanty amī bhūpā ekārāmāś ca vṛṣṇayaḥ \|

māyā-javanikācchannam ātmānaṁ kālam īśvaram \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ekasminn** eva sthāne
**ārāmo**[^117] yeṣāṁ, te'pi \| **kālaṁ** sṛṣṭy-ādi-kāraṇam \|
**īśvaraṁ** niyantāram \|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *ārāma* āvāsaḥ, ārāmo
vāsa-nilaye krīḍāyāś ca vane tathā iti kośāt \| **yaṁ** kṛṣṇam
\|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** evam atratyā eva
te\'smatto\'pi mahā-dhanyā ity āśayenāhuḥ---neti \| ekasmin tvayy
evāramantīti tathā-bhūtāḥ santo **yaṁ** tvām **ātmānaṁ** sarva-vyāpakaṁ
brahmeti **kālaṁ** sarva-saṁhārakatvena bhayaṅkaram iti **īśvaram** iti
ca na **vidanti,** kintu śrī-devakī-nandanaṁ sarva-pratipālakaṁ
parama-priyam iti jānantīty arthaḥ \| kutaḥ? eṣu **māyā**-**yavanikayā
acchannam** anāvṛtam \| īśeṣābhagavattā-prakaṭanād iti bhāvaḥ \|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** aho dūrasthāḥ ! ke vayaṁ yaṁ
śrī-kṛṣṇākhyaṁ svayaṁ bhagavantam amī nikaṭasthāḥ **bhūpā** api tathā
**ekārāmāḥ** **vṛṣṇayo\'pi na vidanti** yāvan-mahimā
tāvattvenānubhavituṁ na śaknuvanti \| nanu satataṁ sarva-mahimāśrayasya
prakaṭa-sthānanubhave kiṁ kāraṇaṁ ? tatrāhuḥ---**māyeti** \|
tādṛśa-mahimāśrayatve kiṁ pramāṇaṁ ? tatrāhuḥ---**yavaniketi** \|
tadvat-tvad icchayāntaraṅgīkṛtānām anubhavo\'pi bhavaty eveti bhāvaḥ \|
mahimānam evāhuḥ---**ātmānaṁ** brahma-rūpaṁ kalayatīti
**kālam-**antaryāmi-rūpam **īśvaraṁ** svayaṁ bhagavat-svarūpam iti
\|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** aho dūrasthā ke vayaṁ **yaṁ**
kṛṣṇākhyaṁ bhagavantam amī nikaṭasthā bhūpā api tathā ekārāmā
vṛṣṇayo\'pi na vadanti \| yāvat mahimā, tāvat tenānubhavituṁ na
śaknuvanti \|

nanu satataṁ sarva-mahimāśrayasya prakaṭasya ananubhave kiṁ kāraṇaṁ
atrāhuḥ---māyeti \| tarhi tādṛśa-mahimāśrayatve kiṁ pramāṇaṁ
tatrāhuḥ---yavaniketi \| tadvat tvad-icchayā antaraṅgīkṛtānām
anubhavo\'pi bhavaty eveti bhāvaḥ \|

mahimānam evāhuḥ---**ātmānaṁ** brahma-svarūpam \| kalayatīti **kālam**
antaryāmi-rūpam īśvaraṁ svayaṁ bhagavat-svarūpam iti \|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** anyas tu tvāṁ na vedaivety
āhuḥ---yatheti dvābhyām \| nāma-mātreti viśeṣeṇa mithyātvam uktam \|
yata indriyābhātam \| he brahmann iti sarva-vyāpakam apīty arthaḥ \|
anyat-tair vyākhyātam \| athavā yataḥ śayāno\'pi puruṣa eṣāṁ vṛṣṇīnāṁ
kaścit pumān **ātmānaṁ** tvām eva yathā yathāvat veda na tu rahitaṁ
tad-vyatiriktaṁ paramanyat \| kutaḥ? guṇānāṁ tvat-kāruṇyādīnāṁ tattvaṁ
satyatva-nityatvādikaṁ paśyati sākṣād anubhavatīti tathā saḥ \|
yathāvattvam evāhuḥ---nāmasu sarva-sañjñāsu mātrāsu viṣayeṣu indriyeṣu
cābhyataṁ svayam eva parisphuritam iti \| yad vā, nāma
śrī-kṛṣṇādi-sañjñā mīyate dṛśyata iti mātrā rūpam \| indriyāṇi ca tair
ābhātam eva śyāmasundaraṁ veda na tu tai rahitaṁ brahma-rūpam ity arthaḥ
\|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** etasmin
śayyāsanādāvāramantīti te **vṛṣṇayaḥ** **ātmānaṁ** parama-premāspadaṁ
**yaṁ** tvām īśvaraṁ na vidanti **amī** asādhavo bhūpāḥ kālaṁ
svasaṁhartāraṁ tvām īśvaraṁ na vidanti kutaḥ māyaiva yavanikā teṣāṁ
jñānasyāvaraṇa-kārikā tayā ācchannaṁ tatra bhūpeṣu **māyā** avidyā
vṛṣṇiṣu yogamāyeti vivecanīyam \|\|23\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.24 \|\|**

yathā śayānaḥ puruṣa ātmānaṁ guṇa-tattva-dṛk \|

nāma-mātrendriyābhātaṁ na veda rahitaṁ param \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** etat sadṛṣṭāntam āhuḥ, yatheti
\| **śayānaḥ** svapnān paśyan \| **guṇa**-**tattva**-**dṛk**
svapna-viṣayeṣu **tattva**-dṛṣṭiḥ \| **nāma**-mātram indriyeṇa manasā
ābhātaṁ siṁha-vyādhrādi-rūpam **ātmānaṁ** **veda** tad **rahitaṁ**
deva-dattādi-rūpam **ātmānaṁ** **na** **veda** **yathā** \|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** etat
bhagavat-svarūpājñānam \| tad-**rahitaṁ** siṁha-vyāghrādibhyo\'nyam
\|\|24-25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** anyastu tvāṁ na vedaivety
āhuḥ---yatheti dvābhyām \| nāma-mātreti viśeṣeṇa mithyātvam uktam, yata
indriyābhātam, he brahmann iti sarva-vyāpakam apīty arthaḥ \| anyat tair
vyākhyātam \|

athavā yataḥ śayāno'pi puruṣa eṣāṁ vṛṣṇīnāṁ kaścit pumān ātmānaṁ tvām
eva, yathā yāthāvat veda, na tu rahitaṁ tad-vyatiriktaṁ paramanyat \|
kutaḥ ? guṇānām tvat-kāruṇyādināṁ tattvaṁ satyatva-nityatvādikaṁ paśyati
sākṣād anubhavatiti tathā saḥ \| yathāvattvam evāhuḥ---nāmasu
sarva-saṁjñāsu mātrāsu viṣayeṣu indriyeṣu cābhātaṁ svayam eva
parisphuritam iti \| yad vā, nāma śrī-kṛṣṇādi-sañjñā mīyate dṛśyata iti
mātrā rūpam, indriyāṇi ca tair ābhātam eva śyāmasundraṁ veda, na tu tai
rahitaṁ brahma-rūpam ity arthaḥ \|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** anyas tv anyathaiva vedety
āhuḥ---yatheti yugmakena \| tat tu tair vyākhyātam \| athavāyaṁ
vyākhyākramaḥ tādṛśatve hetuḥ svīyayā asādhāraṇayā yoga-māyayā
āvaraṇa-śaktyāpi **na** channo nāvṛto mahimā yasya tasmai
aśeṣaiśvarya-prakaṭanāt yad vā, svena bhagavatā yogaḥ bhaktānāṁ saṁyogo
yayā tayā māyayā kṛpayā hetunā acchanna-mahimne ata eva paramātmane
sarveṣāṁ parama-priyatamāya evam atratyā ete asmatto\'pi mahā-dhanyā ity
āhuḥ---yam amī santata-samāgamino bhūyās tathaikārāmā vṛṣṇayaś ca
māyā-yavanikācchannaṁ **na** vidani **na** paśyanti kintu
prakaṭa-sva-svarūpatvād anācchannam eva paśyanti tad anācchannatvam
anubhūyāpi **ātmānaṁ** nirviśeṣa-brahma-svarūpa-mātraṁ **na** paśyanti
kintu tad atikramya saviśeṣa-tat-svarūpam api tādṛśatvam anubhūyāpi
kālam antaryāmi-svarūpa-mātraṁ **na** paśyanti kintu tad atikramya tad
aṁśi-śrī-bhagavataḥ svarūpam api tādṛśatvam anubhūyāpi īśvaraṁ
parameśvara-svarūpa-mātraṁ na paśyanti kintu sarvaṁ tat-tad
anubhavānandatikrame tad apy atikramya
parama-snigdha-bāndhava-kuleśvara-svarūpam iti itthaṁ satāṁ
brahma-sukhānubhūtyā \[bhā.pu. 10.12.11\] ity-ādi-nyāyena rājan patir
gurur alaṁ bhāvataṁ yadūnām \[bhā.pu. 5.6.18\] ity-ādi-nyāyena ca tatra
dṛṣṭāntaḥ **yathā** **guṇa-tattva-dṛk** viṣayānubhavitā
jāgrat-svapnāvasthaḥ puruṣaḥ kramaśas tat-tad anubhūyātikramya ca
**śayānaḥ** suṣuptaḥ san **ātmānaṁ** nāmnā devadattādināma-mātrābhir
viṣayānubhavair indriyaiś cābhātaṁ na **veda** kintu tat-tad-**rahitaṁ**
paraṁ śuddha-sukha-svarūpaṁ vedeti \| yas tu māyayā vibhrama-cittaḥ sa
tvevaṁ na **veda** māyā-vibhramam evāhuḥ---**nāma-**mātrendriyehayā \|
smṛty upaplavād iti athavā śayāno'pi puruṣaḥ vṛṣṇīnāṁ madhye
kaścit-pumān **ātmānaṁ** tvāṁ **yathā** **yathā-**vad-veda **na** tu
**rahitaṁ** tad-vyatiriktaṁ **param** anyat kutaḥ guṇānāṁ kāruṇyādīnāṁ
tattvaṁ satyatva-nityatvādikaṁ paśyati sākṣād anubhavatīti tathā saḥ
yathāvattvam evāhuḥ---nāmasu sarva-sañjñāsu mātrāsu viṣayeṣu ca ābhātaṁ
svayam eva parisphuritam iti eṣāṁ bhagavat-samādhir eva suṣaptam iti
bhāvaḥ \| vakṣyate ca śayyāśanāṭanālāpa \[bhā.pu. 10.90.86\] ity-ādi yad
vā, **nāma** śrī-kṛṣṇādi sañjña mīyate dṛśyata iti mātrā-rūpam indriyāṇi
ca tairābhātam eva śyāma-sundaraṁ **veda** na tu taiḥ **rahitaṁ**
brahma-svarūpam ity arthaḥ \|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** anyastvanyathaiva vedety
āha---yatheti yugmakena \|\|24-26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**
kiñcāneka**-nāma**-rūpātmakam idaṁ jagat tvameka eva tataḥ paro\'pi
bhavasīti loko\'yaṁ na vedeti sadṛṣṭāntam āhur yatheti dvābhyām \|
**yathā** puruṣo jīvaḥ **śayānaḥ** svapnān paśyan **guṇatattva-dṛk**
svapna-viṣayeṣu **tattva**-dṛṣṭiḥ **nāma** vyāghrādi mātrā tad-rūpādi
indriyaṁ tac-chrotrādi tair abhātaṁ vyāghra-sarpa-rājādikam
aneka-**nāma**-rūpaṁ **veda** **na** tu tat-tad-rūpī bhagavantam apy
**ātmānaṁ** svarūpeṇa tad-**rahitaṁ** tato bhinnaṁ paraṁ kevalam ekaṁ
**veda** evam eva tvā tvām ayam ajñānī jano nāmāni deva-manuṣyādīni
mātrās tad-rūpādayaḥ indriyāṇi tacchrotrādīni īhās tac-ceṣṭāś ca
yatastayā māyayā bhramac-cittaḥ san na **veda** tvāṁ jagad-rūpeṇa
bahunām arūpam api svarūpeṇa tato bhinnaṁ na jānātīty arthaḥ \| smṛty
upaplavāt viveka-dhvaṁsāt

\|\|24-25\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.25 \|\|**

e[^118]vaṁ tvā nāma-mātreṣu viṣayeṣv indriyehayā \|

māyayā vibhramac-citto na veda smṛty-upaplavāt \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : evaṁ tvā** **tvā**ṁ
**nāma**-**mātreṣu** svapnādi-tulyeṣu **viṣayeṣv** indriyair yā īhā
pravṛttiḥ, saiva māyā tayā **vibhramac**-**citto** **na** **veda** \|
smṛter viveka-sopaplavān nāśāt \|\|25\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ), śrīnātha-cakravartī
(caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** upasaṁharati-evam iti \|
**tvā** tvaṁ prati ayaṁ sarvo\'pi jane vedānāṁ smṛtīnāṁ ca
dharma-śāstrāṇām upaplavād api **nāma** prākāśye mātrāsu viṣayeṣu yā
indriyāṇām īhā pravṛttis-tayāpi **māyayā** māyā-rūpayā
**vibhramac-citto** **na** bhavati, sadā tvām anubhavatīty arthaḥ
\|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** upasaṁharati evam iti \|
**tvā** tvāṁ prati ayaṁ sarvo\'pi janaḥ vedānāṁ smṛtīnāṁ
dharma-śāstrāṇāṁ copaplavād api **nāma-mātreṣu** yeṣu keṣucit viṣayeṣu
yā indriyāṇām īhā pravṛttis tayāpi māyāyā māyā-rūpayā
**vibhramac-citto** **na** bhavati kintu **veda** sadā tvām anubhavatīty
arthaḥ \| atra ekaṁ **tvā** **nāma-mātreṣu** **viṣayeṣv indriyehayā**
iti pāṭho **na** svāmi-sammataḥ svapnādi-tulya-**viṣayeṣv** iti
samastena vyākhyānāt kintu **evaṁ** tvāyaṁ
brahma-**nāma**-mātrendriyehayā ity eva tat-sammata iti jñeyam
\|\|25\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ),
viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.26 \|\|**

tasyādya te dadṛśimāṅghrim aghaugha-marṣa-

tīrthāspadaṁ hṛdi kṛtaṁ suvipakva-yogaiḥ \|

utsikta-bhakty-upahatāśaya-jīva-kośā

āpur bhavad-gatim athānugṛhāṇa bhaktān \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **aghaughasya** **marṣaṁ**
nā[^119]śaṁ karoti yad gaṅgākhyaṁ **tīrthaṁ,** tasya **āspadam** āśrayaṁ
**te'ṅghriṁ suvipakva-yogair** api **hṛdi kṛtaṁ** kevalaṁ, na tu dṛṣṭam
\| tasya te'ṅghriṁ **dadṛśima** dṛṣṭavanto vayaṁ bahubhiḥ puṇyaiḥ,
ato'smān **bhaktān anugṛhāṇa** \| **bhaktān** kṛtānugrahaṁ kurv ity
arthaḥ \|

nanu kiṁ bhaktyā, yathā-pūrvaṁ tapa eva tapyatām ? iti nety
āhuḥ---**utsiktā** udriktā yā **bhaktiḥ**, taya **upahata**
**āśaya-**lakṣaṇo **jīva-kośo** yeṣāṁ, ta eva pūrve **bhavad-gatim
āpuḥ**, nānya iti \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yaṁ māyayā na veda tasya
ity arthaḥ \| yato vayaṁ tvac-caraṇa-darśanād-gata-pāpā atho ato\'rthe
ato hetoḥ \| *ity artha* iti---

> yadā yasyānugṛhṇāti bhagavān ātmanāṁ gatiḥ \|
>
> bhakti-yogaṁ sa labhate\'neka-janmārjitaiḥ śubhaiḥ \|\| \[bhā.pu.
> 4.29.46\]

ity-ādi-purāṇāt bhakti-dānam eva bhagavataḥ paramānugraha iti bhāvaḥ \|
atrāśaṅkate\--*nanv* iti \| āśaya-lakṣaṇo **jīva-**kośo\'haṅkāraḥ \|
jarayaty āśu yā kośaṁ nigīrṇam analo yathā \[bhā.pu. 3.25.33\] iti
kapilokteḥ \|\| vibudhya bhaktyaiva kathopanītayā prapedire\'ñjo\'cyuta
te gatiṁ \[bhā.pu. 10.14.5\] iti brahmokteś ca \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** ato\'dhunāsmān praty
apīdṛśīṁ kṛpāṁ kurv ity āhuḥ---tasyeti \| itthaṁ nijāśeṣa
māhātmya-prakaṭana-parasya **ādya**! he puruṣottama! yad vā, **adya**
vraja-jana-samāgama-mahotsava-dine **dadṛśima** \| atha asmād dhetor
**anugṛhāṇa** \| tava **aṅghris** tu parama-durdarśa evety
āhuḥ---**tīrthānāṁ** sarveṣām **āspadam** \| sarva-tīrtha-mayyā gaṅgāyāḥ
prabhavatvāt, svabhāvena parama-pāvanatvād vā \| gaṅgāpy asmākaṁ
durlabhā, tadāspadaṁ tu sutarāṁ durlabham eveti bhāvaḥ \| kiṁ ca,
hṛdīty-ādi **suvipakva-yogaiḥ** śrī-sanakādibhir api **hṛdy** eva
**kṛtam** \| āśayaḥ vidyādy-abhimānaḥ bhagavad-gatiṁ śrī-vaikuṇṭha-lokam
\|

nanu nirīśvara-sāṅkhya-mīmāṁsā-māyāvādādi-pravartanena yuṣmad-vidhā
aparādhinaḥ kathaṁ tathānugrāhyā iti cet, tatrāhuḥ\--**aghaughamarṣa**!
he sarvoparādha-kṣamā-karoti \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** upasaṁharanti---**tasya**
evam ativiralānubhavasya **te** tava **aṅghri**-yugmam **adya**
**dadṛśima,** tasmād evādya no janma-sāphalyam ity upakrāntam ity arthaḥ
\| yataḥ parama-sādhana-sādhya-rūpam idam iti kramāt
viśeṣaṇa-dvayenāhuḥ---aghaugheti \|
tvad-bhakti-vimukha-vṛtti-lakṣaṇāparādha-kula-kṣamāpaka-gaṅgādi-mahā-tīrthānām
utpatti-sthānaṁ **supakva-yogair** ātmārāmaiś ca **hṛdi** **kṛtam** iti
\|

nanv ātmarāmatvādikam anādṛtya kiṁ bhaktim eva ślāghadhve ?
tatrāhuḥ---utsikteti \| "apahata-" ity atra "apahṛta-" iti pāṭhe\'pi sa
evārthaḥ \| tasmād **bhaktān** kṛtvā **anugṛhāṇa** yathaivaṁ
darśana-bhāgyaṁ nityam eva jāyeteti bhāvaḥ \|\|26\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** etādṛśa-jñānaṁ vyācakṣāṇā
api vayaṁ tu tvad-bhaktā eva bhaktiṁ vinā etādṛśatvad-darśanānupapatter
ity āhuḥ---tasyeti \| aghaughasya mārṣo yasmāt tasya tīrthasya
gaṅgākhyasya āspadam āśrayaṁ **suvipakva**-yogair api **hṛdi** **kṛtaṁ**
na tu dṛṣṭaṁ vayaṁ tu tavāṅghriṁ dadṛśima \| nanu tad api
liṅga-deha-dhvaṁsanārthaṁ jñānam avaśyāpekṣyam iti tatrāhuḥ---utsiktā
udriktā yā bhaktis tayaiva upahataḥ āśaya-lakṣaṇo **jīva-**kośo yeṣāṁ te
eva pūrve bhagavad-**gatim** āpuḥ nānye atho ata eva **bhaktān** evāsmān
jñātvā anugṛhāṇa \|\|26-27\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.27 \|\|**

**śrī-śuka uvāca---**

ity anujñāpya dāśārhaṁ dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ yudhiṣṭhiram \|

rājarṣe svāśramān gantuṁ munayo dadhire manaḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** itīttham \|\|27\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : ity** evam **anujñāpya**
prasthānārtham anujñāṁ prārthya \| yad vā, **ity** etad **anujñāpya**
vijñāpya dāśārham aśeṣaiśvarya-prakaṭanārthaṁ yadukule\'vatīṇaṁ
sākṣād-bhagavantam, samrāṭtvāt \| sva-svāśramajigamiṣā ca teṣāṁ
tatrastha-śiṣyādi-parivāreṣu bhakty upadeśāyeti jñeyam \| he **rājarṣe**
iti \| ṛṣīṇāṁ svabhāvo\'yaṁ bhavatā jñāyata eveti bhāvaḥ \|\|27\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** iti
vijñapti-prakāra-viśeṣeṇānujñāpya prasthānārtham anujñāṁ prārthya
**dāśārhaṁ** tat-kule\'vatīrṇaṁ svayaṁ bhagavantaṁ **dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ** ceti
tan-madhye upaviṣṭatvād andhatvāt śrī-vyāsātmajatvāc
chrī-yudhiṣṭhirānubodhāc ca sva-svāśrama-jigamiṣāṁ ca teṣāṁ śrī-bhagavad
icchām abhipretya tatrastha-śiṣya-paricārakeṣu bhakty upadeśāyeti jñeyam
\| ato **rājarṣe** iti tat-tad abhiprāyaṁ jānāsyev eti bhāvaḥ \|\|27\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ),
viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.28 \|\|**

tad vīkṣya tān upavrajya vasudevo mahā-yaśāḥ \|

praṇamya copasaṅgṛhya ba[^120]bhāṣedaṁ suyantritaḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** upa-saṅgṛhya caraṇau pāṇibhyāṁ
dhṛtvā \| babhāṣe idam iti saṅdhir ārṣaḥ \|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** tat-teṣāṁ gamanam \|
**tān** munīn \|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tat-teṣāṁ mano **vīkṣya**
abhiprāyaṁ vijñāya ity arthaḥ \| **upavrajya** samīpe gatvā
śrī-bhagavat-pitṛtvena **mahā**-yaśā api \| yadva \|
bhāvi-yaśo-viśeṣābhiprāyeṇa **suyantritaḥ** parama-vinītaḥ san
\|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tat-teṣāṁ mano **vīkṣya**
abhiprāyaṁ vijñāya ity arthaḥ \| **tān upavrajya** teṣāṁ samīpe gatvā
śrī-bhagavat-pitṛtvena **mahā-yaśāḥ** ataḥ śrī-bhagavad-vad eva
laukika-līlām anusṛtya **tad** ucita-sva-yaśasā taṁ ca
lokāṁścānandayitum iti bhāvaḥ \| **su-yantritaḥ** parama-vinītaḥ san
\|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ ceti tan-madhye
upaviṣṭatvena śrī-yudhiṣṭhirānurodhāt \| śrī-bhagavat-pitṛtvena
**mahā-yaśāḥ** \| ataḥ śrī-bhagavadvad eva laukika-līlām anusṛtya
**tad** ucita-sva-yaśasā taṁ lokāṁś cānandayitum iti bhāvaḥ \|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** upasaṅgṛhya pādau dhṛtvā
babhāṣe idam iti sandhir ārṣaḥ \| etāvanto munayo hi nimantryāpy ānetum
aśakyāḥ etair vinā mama hṛt-saṁśayo\'pi duścheda eva **tad**
adhunaivāhaṁ praṣṭavyaṁ pṛcchāmīti bhāvaḥ \|\|28\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.29 \|\|**

**śrī-vasudeva uvāca---**

namo vaḥ sarva-devebhya ṛṣayaḥ śrotum arhatha \|

karmaṇā karma-nirhāro yathā syān nas tad ucyatām \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sarve devā** yeṣu, tebhyaḥ,
yāvatīr vai devatās tāḥ sarvā veda-vidi brāhmaṇe vasanti iti śruteḥ \|
yena **karmaṇā** **yathā**-kṛtena vā karmaṇāṁ **nirhāro** nirāso bhavati
**tad** **ucyatām** \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *yāvatīr* yāvatyaḥ, *tās*
tāvatyaḥ \| *iti śruti*-padārthaḥ \| iyam eva śruti-viprāṇāṁ
tapta-mudrā-dhāraṇābhāvaṁ dyotayati \| śrutau yā vedavittvoktiḥ sā
gāyatrī vai sarvam idam iti śruter *gāyatryāḥ* sarva-veda-mūlatvena
tan-mātra-vidy api vartata eva \| etad abhipretyaiva bhagīrathaṁ prati
bṛhan-nāradīye dharma-rājenoktaṁ---

> brāhmaṇasya tanūjñaiyā sarva-deva-samanvitā \|
>
> sā cet santāpitā rājan kiṁ vakṣyāmi tad enasaḥ \|\|
>
> śaṅkha-cakrādy-aṅkanaṁ ca gīta-nṛtyādikaṁ tathā \|
>
> eka-jāter ayaṁ dharmo na jātu syād dvijanmanaḥ \|\|
>
> śaṅkha-cakraṁ mṛdā yas tu kuryāt taptāyasena vā \|
>
> sa śūdravad bahiḥ kāryaḥ sarvasmād dvija-karmaṇaḥ \|\| ity
> āśvalāyanenāpy uktam \|

śrutau brāhmaṇa-padaṁ dvijāti-param eva \| bṛhan-nāradīyādi-vākyasya
tad**-**upabṛṁhaṇatvāt, tad-dhṛti-vidhāyaka-vākyāni dvijetara-parāṇy eva
\| vaiṣṇavābhāsair vipra-paratva-bodhakāni vākyāni kalpayitvā purāṇeṣv
ādhunikair nikṣiptāni \| yāḥ śrutayas tatra pramāṇatvena nyastāḥ, tā
veda-bhāṣya-kartṛbhir anya-paratayā vyākhyātāḥ \| smṛtayaś ca
hārītādyāḥ, teṣāṁ prasiddha-smṛtibhyo viruddhatvāt kalpitā eva \| yadi
prāptau satyāṁ niṣedha iti nyāyam āśritya brāhmaṇaṁ prati prāptam eveti
niṣidhyate \| tatrottaraṁ na hi brāhmaṇaṁ prakṛtyā kutrāpi surā-pānaṁ
vidhi-niṣedhas tu sarvatraivaivamatrāpy aprāpta-niṣedho\'yam \| kiṁ ca,
tāntrikaiḥ prasiddha-varṇāśramebhyaḥ itare\'pi brāhmaṇādi-varṇā
brahma-caryādy āśramāś ca

svīkṛtās tad-viṣayam eva vaitad-vidhānam, spaṣṭaṁ
caitat-sūta-saṁhitāyām\| vastutas tu tāntriko\'yaṁ vidhis tatra
vaidikānāṁ nādhikāras tad uktaṁ---

> viṣṇv āgamādi-tantreṣu dīkṣitānāṁ vidhīyate \|
>
> śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padmair aṅkanaṁ nānya-dehinām \|\|
>
> śruti-patha-galitānāṁ mānuṣāṇāṁ tu tantraṁ
>
> guru-guru-khileśaḥ sarva-vit prāha śambhuḥ \|
>
> śruti-patha-niratānām asti naivātra kiñcid
>
> dhita-karam iha sarvaṁ puṣkalaṁ satyam uktam \|\|

ity alaṁ prasaktānuprasaktena \| yad vā, sarvasmin deśe kāle śāstre
itihāse purāṇe vede āgame ca devo devanaṁ prakāśanaṁ yeṣāṁ te tebhyas
tathā \| sarva-loka-pūjyebhya ity arthaḥ \| nirāso mūla-cchedaḥ \| tat
tathā \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : namo** vo yuṣmad yam iti
prāg eva natir vijñāpanārthaṁ bhakti-viśeṣāt \| he **ṛṣayaḥ**! iti
sarvajñatvaṁ dyotayati \| ataḥ **śrotum arhatha** yogyā bhavatha \|
man-nivedyam iti śeṣaḥ \| kiṁ ? tad āha---karmaṇeti \| svayaṁ tena
jñāyamānasyāpi tasya tān prati praśnaḥ \| sat-tīrthe tasmin
nṛpa-muni-bandhu-gaṇa-samāje yajña-mahotsavecchaya teṣām eva munīnām
uktyā tais tat-pravartanārtham \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** kiṁ ? tad āha---karmaṇeti \|
svayaṁ jñāyamānasyāpi tān prati praśnas teṣāṁ tad-upadeśādhikāriṇāṁ
pramāṇanena maryādā-pratipālanāya \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nanv aho
asman-manoratha-duṣprāpa-bhāgadheyaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-pitāsau katham anyac
chreyaḥ pṛcchati cet taṁ tyaktvā katham anyaṁ pṛcchatīti vismitya
munayas tūṣṇīm āsan \| śrī-nāradas tu pūrvoktaṁ tad-abhiprāyaṁ buddhvāpy
asahamāna evam acintayat yathāyaṁ khalu **sarva**-śreyaḥ-patha-pravīṇaḥ
śrī-kṛṣṇa-mahimaniṣṇātaś ca \| na tu

śrī-nandavat**-**tadīyake vala-mādhurī-magnaḥ tathāpi yad idaṁ pṛcchati
tatkila laukika-līlāyāṁ sva-dvārā sva-putrasya
sāttvika-yaśo-vistārayaṇāyaiva tac-cātituccham eva \|
parama-kāṣṭhāvariṣṭhasya tataḥ svayaṁ bhagavān vā kathañcit
ātma-mahima-gopanīṁ tat-tal-līlā prakāśayatu kathantarāmayam api **tad**
anuvartate yadi ca vayam apy etad anuvartāmahe tadā muhyed eva lokaḥ
tasmād etad upālambha-vavyājena śrī-bhagavan-mahimaivāsmābhir
vyañjayituṁ yogya iti \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sarva-devebhya** iti \|
yāvatīr vai devatās tāḥ sarvā veda-vidi brāhmaṇe vasanti iti śruteḥ \|
karmaṇaiva karmaṇāṁ **nirhāro** nāśo yatheti mama
gṛha-putra-kalatrādi-mahā-saktasya jñāna-bhaktyor anadhikārād iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|29\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.30 \|\|**

**śrī-nārada uvāca---**

nā[^121]ticitram idaṁ viprā vasudevo bubhutsayā \|

kṛṣṇaṁ matvārbhakaṁ yan naḥ pṛcchati śreya ātmanaḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** śrī-**kṛṣṇaṁ** hitvāsmān
pṛcchatīti vismitān praty āha---nātīti \| **bubhutsayā** boddhum icchayā
\|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yad **vasudevo** **naḥ**
**pṛcchati,** **tan nāticitram** \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** śrī-bhagavati
sākṣād-virājamāne\'pi tasya snehabhareṇa tad aiśvarya-vismṛtyā munīn
prati praśnena kāṁścid-vismitāṁs tān bhagavad-bhakti-māhātmyābhijñaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ snehabhara-svabhāvam āha---neti \| api eva naiva \| citram
adbhutam \| atīti citsukhaḥ \| **kṛṣṇaṁ** sākṣād-bhagavantami
snehabhareṇārbhakaṁ śiśuṁ matvā \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tatra nanv aho
asman-manoratha-duṣprāpa-bhāgadheyaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-pitāsau katham anyac
chreyaḥ pṛcchati ? pṛcchati cet, taṁ tyaktvā katham anyaṁ pṛcchati ?
vismitya munayas tūṣṇīm āsan \| śrī-nāradas tu pūrvoktaṁ tad-abhiprāyaṁ
buddhvāpy asahamāna evam acintayat \| yathāyaṁ khalu
sarva-śreyaḥ-patha-pravīṇaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-mahima-niṣṇātaś ca, na tu
śrī-nandavat tadīya-kevala-mādhurī-magnaḥ, tathāpi yad idaṁ pṛcchati tat
kila laukika-līlāyāṁ sva-dvārā sva-putrasya tasya
sāttvika-yaśo-vistāraṇāyaiva tac cātituccham eva
parama-mahima-kāṣṭhā-variṣṭhasya tasya tataḥ svayaṁ śrī-bhagavān vā
kathañcid ātma-mahima-gopanī tat-tal-līlāṁ prakāśayati \| katham
antarāyam api tad anuvartate \| yadi vayam apy etad anuvartāmahe, tadā
muhyad eva lokaḥ tasmād etad upālambha-vyājena
śrī-bhagavan-mahimaivāsmābhir vyañjayituṁ yogya iti tathaivāha---nāpīti
caturbhiḥ \| tatra tad upālambhaḥ loka-moha-doṣaḥ uttarābhyām apīti
śakaṭākhyam atīti cit-sukhaḥ **kṛṣṇaṁ** svayaṁ bhagavattvena
sarva-puruṣārtha-śiromaṇim api sarvajña-śiromaṇim apīty arthaḥ \|
arbhakaṁ laukikāpaty atulyaṁ matvā **ātmanaḥ** śreyaḥ
puruṣārthāntara-sādhanaṁ **pṛcchati** tatrāpi taṁ samīpavartinaṁ
parityajyāsmān pṛcchatīty arthaḥ \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tathaivāha---nāpīti caturbhiḥ \|
martyānām iti \| martya-līlāṅgīkārād asyāpi tādṛśo bhāvo jāta iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|30-33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nanu sākṣād-virājamāne
śrī-kṛṣṇe vasudevaḥ katham asmān pṛcchatīti munīnām āśaṅkām udbhāvya
nārado vadati-nāpi citram ity-ādi \| vasudevasya
vātsalya-rasa-bhaktatvāt kṛṣṇe nityam arbhaka-buddhir eva nopadeṣṭa
buddhir iti tam arbhakaṁ matvā **naḥ** pṛcchatīti nāpi citram \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** aho ayaṁ bhagavataḥ
pitāpy ātmānaṁ saṁsāriṇaṁ manyate yadi vā parārthaṁ **pṛcchati** tad api
**kṛṣṇaṁ** hitvā katham asmān pṛcchatīty ativismitāṁs tān praty
āha---nāpīti \| arbhakaṁ sva-putram eva na tv īśvaram ataḥ **ātmanaḥ**
svasyaiva \|\|30\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.31 \|\|**

sannikarṣo'tra[^122] martyānām anādaraṇa-kāraṇam \|

gāṅgaṁ hitvā yathānyāmbhas tatratyo yāti śuddhaye \|\|

[^123]

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tatratyo** gaṅgā-tīra-vāsī
\|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** anyāmbhas taḍāgādi jalam
\|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** sneha-bharaṁ cādaraṁ
hrāsayantīti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha---sannikarṣa iti \| sneha-bhareṇa
sadātisānnidhyam \| yad vā, samyak sarvato nitarāṁ ca karṣati ākarṣatīti
**sannikarṣaḥ** sneha-bharaḥ \| **hi** yataḥ \| samāsāntargatasyāpy
**ambhaso gāṅgam** ity anenāpy anvayaḥ \|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** pūrvatra hetuḥ---**sannikarṣo
hi** iti \| "sannikarṣo\'tra" iti pāṭhaḥ kvacit-pūrvatraiva dṛṣṭāntaḥ \|
gāṅgam iti **martyānām** iti martya-līlāṅgīkārādasyāpi tādṛśo bhāvo jāta
iti bhāvaḥ \| gāṅgam ambha iti gamyam anyāmbhas tīrthāntaram ity arthaḥ
\|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nanu sannikarṣaja evāsminn
ayam anādaraḥ anu vātsalyeneti punaḥ śaṅkāntaraṁ nirasyann
āha---sannikarṣa ity-ādi \| tat tu **martyānām** eva, na tu mad-vidhānām
\| tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ\--**gāṅgam** ity-ādi \|\|31-40\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu kṛṣṇasya
janma-kṣaṇam ārabhyaiva tam īśvaratvenāyaṁ jānāty eva ? satyaṁ, tad api
sannikarṣa evānādara-hetur ity āha---sannikarṣa iti \| atra
śrī-vasudevasya premāṇam eva tad-aiśvaryānanusandhāne hetuṁ nārado
jānāty eva \| tad api tasmin mahā-saṁsadi prema-siddhāntam atirahasyam
avivṛṇvan loka-rītyaiva samādadhau \| śrāvayitvā vasudevasya tasya
tad-aiśvarya-jñānaṁ ca proddīpayāmāseti tattvaṁ jñeyam \| anādaro\'tra
gauravam anānā-bhāvaḥ \|\|31\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.32 \|\|**

yasyānubhūtiḥ kālena layotpatty-ādināsya vai \|

svato'nyasmāc ca guṇato na kutaścana riṣyati \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**
śrī-kṛṣṇe'rbhakatvamāno'vidyā-vijṛmbhata ity āha---yasyeti dvābhyām \|
anubhūtir jñānaṁ kutaścid api na **riṣyati** na naśyati \| tad
evāha---**kālena** karka-ṭikā-phala-vat \| asya viśvasya
**layotpatty**-ādināpi \| svataś ca vidyud-ādi-vat \| anyasmāc ca
mudgarāder ghaṭādi-vat \| **guṇato** rūpādy-antarotpatteḥ pūrva-rūpādinā
dehādi-vat \|\|32\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** arbhakatvamāno
bālatvābhimānaḥ tad evajñānānaśanam eva \| **riṣyati** riṣa hiṁsāyām
divādir laṭ \|\|32\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : na** ca mantavyam
śrī-vasudevo\'yamasya māhātmyaṁ **na** vettīti \| yataḥ prākṛta eva
**na** jānātīty āha---yasyeti dvābhyām \| ādi-śabdāt sthitiḥ \| **vai**
api \| tat-tan-mahā-vyāpārād apīty arthaḥ \|\|32\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** yasyeti yugmakam \| yasya
kartuḥ karmaṇaś cānubhūtir-jñāna-lakṣaṇā prakāśa-lakṣaṇā ca **na**
naśyati api tu nityaṁ virājata eva ity arthaḥ anyat-taiḥ \|
tatrāsyety-ādau viśvasya **layotpatty-**ādi-hetunāpi kāleneti
yojanikārthaḥ tathā ghaṭāder nāśa-sambandhī yo mudgarādis tenaiva ity
arthaḥ \| tathāka **guṇato** rūpādy antarotpatter hetoḥ
pūrva-rūpādi-nāśa-dvārā yathā dehādir naśyatīty arthaḥ \| dṛṣṭāntāś
caite vyatirekeṇa eva tathā advitīyaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇam iti tasyaiva svayaṁ
bhagavattvābhiprāyāt viśeṣaṇānām eteṣāṁ yathottaraṁ
manuṣya-mananāyogyatve śraiṣṭhyam \| tathāpi kleśādibhiḥ prāṇādibhiś
copagūḍham anyaḥ sādhāraṇo janaḥ nija-parikaraiḥ kleśādibhiḥ prāṇādibhiś
ca hetubhir manyate svayaṁ kleśādi-yuktaḥ ātmānumānānusāreṇa tam api
svasadṛśaṁ manyeta ity arthaḥ \| rāhorapi sūrya-vibhavatvaṁ sūryasya
graha-rājatvāt yad vā, taṁ kleśādīnāṁ tatrāty
antābhāvavattvāt-tair-avyāhatānubhavam ata eveśvaraṁ parādhīna-jñānatvāt
parama-svatantraṁ tathā sarvasya tad eka-prakāśyatvād-advitīyaṁ
śrī-kṛṣṇam imam anyaḥ pṛthag-jana eva sva-vibhavaiḥ
svarūpa-vibhava-rūpair api prāṇendriyair ādi-grahaṇāt-tat-tad avayavaiś
copagūḍhaṁ paricchinna-jñānādikaṁ manyeta manyata iti sambhāvyate taiḥ
kam iva manyate meghādibhiḥ sūryam ivety anvayaḥ \|

arthaś cāyam---sūryas tāvan-meghādibhir-yat paricchinna-prakāśādiko
bhavati tadyuktam eva meghasya tad
aṁśākṛṣṭa-jalamaya-dhūmādi-pariṇāma-rūpatvāt himasya tad
ākṛṣṭa-jala-paramāṇusaṅgha-rūpatvāt uparāga-hetur āhos
tat-pratiyogitamo-rūpatvāt tasyāsya cakṣurādayas tu **na** tad-vidhāḥ
kintu svarūpa-vibhava-rūpāḥ tasmāt-tair ācchanna-jñānādir na bhavati
**na** hi sūryo meghādibhir iva svarūpa-vibhavaiḥ
prakāśauṣṇyādibhir-ācchanna-prakāśādir bhavati pratyuta taiḥ prakāśata
eva tasmāt-svarūpasya kāla-deśādy aparicchinnatvena tad-vibhavānāṁ
cakṣurādīnāṁ tādṛśatvād aparicchinna-jñānādir evāyaṁ syāt nīca eva tu
jano\'nyathā manyata iti tad uktaṁ---**na** cāntarna bahir yasya
\[bhā.pu. 10.9.13\] iti nātaḥ paraṁ parama-yad-bhavataḥ svarūpam
ihādyante yenādṛto naraka-bhāgbhir asat-prasaṅgair iti ye tu
tvadīyety-ādi \[bhā.pu. 3.9.3-5\] \|\|32-33\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bho brahmajña-pūjya-pādāḥ
\| **na** kevalam atrāyaṁ vasudeva evopālabhyaḥ kiṁ tv atratyaḥ prāyaḥ
sarva eva lokaḥ kṛṣṇam īśvaraṁ **na** jānātīty āha---yasyeti dvābhyām \|
yasya anubhūtir jñānaṁ kutaścid api na **riṣyati** **na** naśyati taṁ
śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ prāṇādibhi rupagūḍham ācchannam anyaḥ prākṛto\'yaṁ lokaḥ svam
ivam anyata ity anvayaḥ \| tad evāha---**kālena** karkaṭikā-phalavat
kīdṛśena asya viśvasya layotpattikāraṇena svataś ca vidyudādivat
anyasmāc ca mudgarāder ghaṭādivat guṇatas tamoguṇena brahmāṇḍavat **na**
**riṣyati** \|\|32\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.33 \|\|**

taṁ kleśa-karma-paripāka-guṇa-pravāhair

avyāhatānubhavam īśvaram advitīyam \|

prāṇādibhiḥ sva-vibhavair upagūḍham anyo

manyeta sūryam iva megha-himoparāgaiḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tam eva kutaścid apy
**avyāhatānubhavam** ata eveśvaram \| kiṁ ca, advitīyaṁ kṛṣṇam anyaḥ
prākṛta **upagūḍham** ācchannaṁ manuṣyo **manyeta** \| kaiḥ ?
**kleśa**-karmādibhiḥ \| tatra kleśā rāgādayaś ca tat-pūrvakāṇi karmāṇi
ca tat-paripāke sukha-duḥkhe ca sattvādīnāṁ guṇānāṁ punaḥ pravāhaś ca
taiḥ prāṇādibhiś ca svair vibhavaiḥ svakāryaiḥ \| atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ,
**megha**-himoparāgair abhra-tuṣāra-rāhubhiḥ sva-vibhavaiḥ **sūryam**
iveti \|\|33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : taṁ** kṛṣṇam \| ata
evāhatajñānatvād eva \| sarvathā vidyamānaiśvaryo\'py ajñānām anīśa eva
pratīyate ity āha---kiñceti \| tatra teṣu kleśādiṣu \| tat-pūrvakāṇi
rāgādi-pūrvakāṇi \| tat-paripāke **karma-**phale \| punaḥ punaḥ pravāho
muhur muhuḥ sṛṣṭyādi-rūpo vā
śānta-ghora-vimūḍhatvādi-svabhāva-vaśāc-chuklādi-**karma-**karaṇāvicchedaḥ
\| atra kāryeṇa kāraṇāvṛttau abhra-tuṣārarāhavo hi ravi-prakāśyatvena
ravi-kāryāṇyeva tad-dhetutvāt-prasiddher dṛg-rūpābhyāṁ yathā raveḥ
\[bhā.pu. 10.54.46\] ity-ādy ukteḥ prakāśya-prakāśakayor api
kārya-kāraṇabhāvo\'jñāna-prapañcādiṣu dṛśyata eveti \|\|33\|\|

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā), jīva-gosvāmī
(laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : avyāhatānubhavam**
akuṇṭha-jñānam **advitīyam** asadṛśam \| viśeṣaṇānām eṣāṁ yathottaraṁ
manuṣyamananāyogyatve śraiṣṭhyam \| tathāpi kleśādibhiḥ prāṇādibhiś
copagūḍham \| ādi-śabdādīndriyādayaḥ \| anyaḥ śrī-vasudevetaraḥ \|
prākṛtaḥ **sva**-**vibhavair** nija-parikaraiḥ kleśādibhiś ca hetubhir
**manyeta** \| svayaṁ kleśādiyukta ātmānumānena tam api sva-sadṛśaṁ
**manyeta** ity arthaḥ \| anyat tair vyākhyātam \|

yad vā, kleśādibhir viśiṣṭo\'nvaya upagūḍhaṁ manyate śrī-vasudevastu
sarvathā parama-prakaṭam eva vettīty arthaḥ \| tathāpi
snehabhara-svabhāvena tad-vismṛtirity uktam eva \| sā ca
śrī-bhagavat-kṛpayaiveti pañca-catvāriṁśādhyāyārambhe pitarāv
upalabdhārthau \[bhā. 10.45.1\] ity atra tair vyañjitam eva \| agre ca
vyaktaṁ bhāvīti dik \|\|33\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ukta-poṣa-nyāyenemam
arthaṁ punar āha---tam iti \| kleśā rāgādayaś ca karmāṇi
**kleśa-**hetavaś ca paripākāḥ tat-kārya-sukha-duḥkhāni ca guṇānāṁ
sattvādīnāṁ tair na vyāhato\'nubhavo jñānaṁ yasya **taṁ**
**prāṇādibhiḥ** prāṇa-manobuddhyādibhir liṅga-śarīra-ghaṭakaiḥ
sva-vibhavaiḥ svakāryair evācchannam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ meghaś ca himaḥ
kuheḍikā ca uparāgo rāhuś ca taiḥ sva-vibhavaiḥ **sūryam** **iva**
meghasya saura-jyotir jalātmakatvāt jalasya jyotiḥ-kāryatvāt himasya ca
jala-viśeṣatvāt rāhoś ca duṣṭa-jīvāviṣṭadhvāntakhaṇḍātmakatvāt
dhvāntasya ca cakṣur grāhyatvena paurāṇika-mate taijasatvāt meghādīnāṁ
sūrya-kāryatvam \|\|33\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.34 \|\|**

athocur munayo rājann ābhā[^124]ṣyānakadundubhim \|

sarveṣāṁ śṛṇvatāṁ rā[^125]jñāṁ tathaivācyuta-rāmayoḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atha nārada-vākyānantaram
\|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** atha
śrī-vasudeva-māhātmya-śravaṇānantaram ābhāṣya bho mahā-dhanya! he
jagat-pūjyety-ādi sambodhya he **rājann** iti śrī-vasudeva-māhātmyena
praharṣodayāt kiṁ vā, tac-chravaṇena rājñaḥ
prema-vikārodaya-śobhā-darśanāt \| saptamy arthe ṣaṣṭhyaḥ \| sarveṣu
rājasu śṛṇvatsv iti tān praty upadeśārtham acyuta-rāmayoś ca śṛṇvator
iti vakṣyamāṇārthasya prāmāṇyārtham \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** athānantaraṁ
śrī-vasudeva-nāradayor abhiprāyaṁ buddhvobhaya-samādhānārtham ity arthaḥ
\| tatra śrī-nārad asamādhānaṁ tu vasudeva bhavānnūnam iti
uttara-padyena jñeyam \| ābhāṣya bhoḥ parama-kṛtārtha-śiromaṇe he
jagat-pūjyety-ādi-sambodhya saptamy arthe ṣaṣṭhyaḥ \| sarveṣu rājasu
śṛṇvatsu iti tān praty upadeśārtham acyuta-rāmayoś ca śṛṇvator iti
vakṣyamāṇārthaḥ prāmāṇyārthaḥ \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** atha anantaraṁ
śrī-vasudeva-nāradayor abhiprāyaṁ buddhvo-bhaya-samādhānārtham ity
arthaḥ \| śrī-nārada-samādhānaṁ tvatra vasudeva bhavānnūnaṁ ity
antima-padyena jñeyam \|\|34-36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** sarveṣām ity-ādiṣu
saptamy arthe ṣaṣṭhyaḥ \|\|34\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.35 \|\|**

karmaṇā karma-nirhāra eṣa sādhu-nirūpitaḥ \|

yac chraddhayā yajed viṣṇuṁ sarva-yajñeśvaraṁ makhaiḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yad**-yajed**-**eṣa** ity
anvayaḥ \|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : sādhu** yathā syāt-tathā
nirūpitaḥ śāstrajñaiḥ \| yad vā, sādhubhir nirūpitaḥ śraddhayā
śrī-viṣṇuyajane viśvāsena bhaktyā vā **viṣṇuṁ** svamahimnā
viśva-vyāpakaṁ bhagavantam evam anyaiḥ sarvair **yajed** iti
yat-tasyaiva yajane vyakta-hetv antaraṁ sarveṣāṁ yajñānām īśvaraṁ
phala-dātāram \| kiṁ vā, svāminaṁ **sarva** deveśvaratvāt \|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** eṣa eva **karmaṇā**
kriyamāṇena karmaṇāṁ kṛtānāṁ nihāraḥ **sādhu** yathā syāt-tathā
nirūpitaḥ śāstrajñaiḥ \| kaḥ śraddhayā viśvāsena **viṣṇuṁ** sva-mahimnā
viśva-vyāpakaṁ svayaṁ bhagavantam eva **makhaiḥ** sarvair **yajed** iti
yat sa ity arthaḥ \| tasyaiva yajane vyaktaṁ hetv antaraṁ sarveṣāṁ
yajñādīnām īśvaraṁ phala-dātāraṁ **sarva-**deveśvaratvāt tad-yajanaṁ
vinā naiṣkarmyasyāpi heyatvam uktam---naiṣkarmyam ap**y**
acyuta-bhāva-varjitam \[bhā.pu. 1.5.12\] ity-ādinā \| evaṁ ced-bhavad
abhīṣṭaṁ tathāpi bhavat-putra evāyaṁ prakārāntareṇārādhanīya iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|35\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : karma**-nirhāro yathā syād
iti prakāra-praśnotram āhuḥ---**yac-**chraddhayeti \| makhānāṁ
viṣṇvārādhaka-jñānaṁ vinā **karma**-nirhāro na bhaved iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|35\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.36 \|\|**

cittasyopaśamo'yaṁ vai kavibhiḥ śāstra-cakṣuṣā \|

darśitaḥ su-gamo yogo dharmaś cātma-mud-āvahaḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** cittasyopaśama upaśama-hetuḥ,
**yogo** mokṣopāyaś ca \| śanair ātma-**mud**am āvahatīti tathā \|
su-gamaḥ pravṛtty-āśrayatvāt \| **dharmaś** cāvaśyakaḥ \| anyathā
vihitākaraṇena māliny-aprasaṅgāt \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** ayam ātmana īśasya
**mudāvahaḥ** prītikaraḥ citta-śodhako vā \| śraddhayā
viṣṇu-yajana-lakṣaṇaḥ \| anyathā etad anācaraṇe \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tat-phalaṁ cāpy
āhuḥ---cittasyeti \| **vai** eva ayam eva-śāstram eva cakṣus tena
śāstrārtha-tattva-vicāreṇa ity arthaḥ \| **darśitaḥ** prakaṭitaḥ
pravartita ity arthaḥ \| **yogo** bhagavad-bhakty upāyaḥ **dharmaś** ca
bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ \| arcanaika-prakāratvāt \| ata evātmanaḥ kartuḥ ātmanāṁ
vā sarva-jīvānām eva **mudāvahaḥ** \| bahudhā tat-sambandhāt \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** sādhutvam evāhuḥ---cittasyeti
\| ayaṁ **vai** pūrvokta-prakāraka-karma-nirhāra eva cittasya upa
ādhikyena śamaḥ śamo man-niṣṭhatābuddher \[bhā.pu. 11.19.36\] iti
śrī-svayam-bhagavat-sammataḥ śamaḥ prāpakatvāt tatrāpi sugamaḥ sukaro
yoga upāyaḥ svataḥ-siddhānāṁ makhānāṁ saṅkalpa-viśeṣamātreṇa
tādṛśatva-siddheḥ na tv aṣṭāṅgādivat kaṣṭa-sādhyaḥ tathā ayam eva mukhyo
dharmaḥ bhāgavata-dharma-praveśena sarva-dharmāśrayatvāt tatrāpi
santata-śrī-bhagavat-sphūrti-mayatvenātma-mudāvahaś ca na tu
tat-kāma-sphūrti-maya-dharmavan-mātsaryādi-duḥkhāvahaḥ tasmād ayam eva
**kavibhiḥ** śāstrajñaiḥ **śāstra-cakṣuṣā** **śāstra-**rūpaṁ yac-cakṣur
arthaprakāśakaṁ tad-dānena **darśitaḥ** prakāśita ity arthaḥ \|\|36\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** upaśamaḥ upaśama-hetuḥ
sugamaḥ pravṛttyāśrayatvāt yogaḥ mokṣa-prāptau upāyaḥ ātma-**mudāvahaḥ**
manaḥ-sukha-pradaś ca \|\|36\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.37 \|\|**

ayaṁ svasty-ayanaḥ panthā dvi-jāter gṛha-medhinaḥ \|

yac chraddhayāpta-vittena śu[^126]klenejyeta pūruṣaḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nanu, na karmaṇā na prajayā
dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ \[Nārā 12.3\]; BSoBh 3.4.19
ity-ādinā tyāgasyaiva vihitatvāt kathaṁ karma mokṣopāyaḥ ? ity
āśaṅkyādāv eva tyāgasyāśakyatvād ity āśayenāhuḥ---ayam iti
sārdha-caturbhiḥ \| **svasty**-**ayanaḥ** svasti kṣemam īyate'neneti
tathā \| śraddhayā niṣkāmatayā śuklena śuddhenāptena **vittena** puruṣa
īśvara ijyeteti yad eṣa panthāḥ \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atrāśaṅkate---nanv iti \|
śuddhena nyāyārjitena \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** nanu tarhi
mukhya-śravaṇādi-bhaktir eva sākṣāt-kāryā, kiṁ
bahu-vyāpāra-gauṇāṅga-yajñaiḥ? tatrāhuḥ---ayam iti dvābhyām \|
**svasty** ayano nirvighna-bhakti-prāpaka ity arthaḥ \|
dvijotaḥ-traivarṇikasya āptena svavṛttyā labdhena nyāyārjitena ity
arthaḥ \| ata eva śuklena aviraktānāṁ vittavatāmādau yajñair dhanārpaṇam
evocitam iti bhāvaḥ \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** atrāpy ayam
ity-ādi-**svastyayanaḥ** gārhasthyāśramasya vittasya
bhagavat-samarpaṇa-rūpayā prapattyā mat-prasādāt **dvi**j-**ātetr**
aivarṇikasya anyasyān adhikārāt āptena sva-pravṛttyā labdhena
nyāyārjitena ity arthaḥ \| ata eva śuklena yathoktaṁ
śrī-viṣṇu-dharmottare---

> pratigraheṇa yal-labdhaṁ yājyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā \|
>
> guṇānv itebhyo viprasya śuklaṁ tatrividhaṁ smṛtam \|\|
>
> yuddhopalabdhaṁ kāraṁ ca daṇḍāc ca vyavahārataḥ \|
>
> kṣatriyasya dhanaṁ śuklaṁ trividhaṁ parikīrtitam \|\|
>
> kṛṣi-vāṇijya-go-rakṣāḥ kṛtvā śuklaṁ tathā viśaḥ \|
>
> dvija-śuśrūṣayā labdhaṁ śuklaṁ śūdrasya kīrtitam \|\|
>
> kramāgataṁ prīti-dāyaṁ prāptaṁ ca saha-bhāryayā \|
>
> aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṁ dhanaṁ śukle prakīrtitam \|\|
>
> śuklena **vittena** kṛtaṁ puṇyaṁ bahuphalaṁ bhavet \|\| iti \|

nanu puruṣejyaiva cet-kartavyā tarhi mukhya-nava-vidha-bhakty aṅgena
yajñādinā tatrāhuḥ---**gṛha-medhinaḥ** gārhasthya-dharmāgrahavataḥ ity
arthaḥ \| tac ca samyak śraddhatvābhāvāt loka-saṅgrahānadv eti jñeyam
\|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : gṛhamedhinaḥ**
gārhasthya-dharmāgrahavata ity arthaḥ \| bhagavad arcādi śraddhāvatāṁ
tutad eva paramaśreya iti bhāvaḥ \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : dvi**-jātes traivarṇikasya
āpta-**vittena** nyāya-prāpta-dhanena śuddhena \|\|37\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.38 \|\|**

vittaiṣaṇāṁ yajña-dānair gṛhair dāra-suteṣaṇām \|

ātma-lokaiṣaṇāṁ deva kālena visṛjed budhaḥ \|

grāme tyaktaiṣaṇāḥ sarve yayur dhīrās tapo-vanam \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** svasty-ayanam āhuḥ, vittaiṣaṇām
iti \| vitta-phala-bhūtair yajñair dānaiś ca **vittaiṣaṇāṁ** vittecchāṁ
visṛjet \| **gṛhair** gṛhocitair mogair **dāra**-sutaiṣaṇāṁ visṛjet \|
tad anubhavenaiva tad autsukya-nivṛtteḥ \| dehe mṛte ātmanaḥ
svargādi-**lokaiṣaṇāṁ** **kālena** kṣayānusandhānena visṛjet \| **deva**
he vasudeva \| yad vā, **deva**-**kālena** devānām api mṛtyunā \|
mṛtyu[^127]-hetu-bhūtenety arthaḥ \| atrācāraṁ pramāṇayati, grāma iti
\|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : budhaḥ** saṁsārāsārajñaḥ \|
**vittaiṣaṇāṁ** dhanecchām \| tad anubhavena **dāra-**sutādy anubhavena
\| teṣv autsukyasyotkaṇṭhāyāḥ \| **deva-**śabdena vasudeva-grahaṇam
ekadeśi-nyāyāpekṣa-mata āha---yadv eti \| atraiṣaṇātrayatyāge \|
**dhīrās** tyāga-śaktimantaḥ \| **grāme** gṛhasthāśrame \|
gṛhasthasyaiva grāma-sthity adhikārāt tat-sthyātāc-chabdyam iti nyāyena
\|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tasmād eva vittaiṣaṇāpi
kṣīyate nānyatheti \| sadṛṣṭāntam āha---vitteti \| **gṛhair**
ity-ādika-dṛṣṭāntatayā evam agre\'pi budho vivekī anyathā vittavato
gṛhasthasya manaḥ-śuddhy abhāvena śravaṇādi-bhakter evāsiddher iti
bhāvaḥ \|

nanu tarhi kevala-śravaṇādi-paratāsiddhaye dhanādi-sahitaṁ gṛham eva
tyājyam, tatrāhuḥ---grāma iti \| gṛhāśrame dhīrā buddhimantaḥ
eṣaṇākṣayābhāvenāviraktasya tyāgo nopayukta iti bhāvaḥ \|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tasmiṁs
tat-tad-darpaṇāt-tat-prasādena tat-tad-eṣaṇāpi kṣīyata ity
āhuḥ---vitteti \| **yajña-**dānaiḥ vitta-vyayamayatat-tat-karmabhiḥ
pūrvoktarītyā bhavad-ijyārthaiḥ tathā gṛhais
tatratya-**dāra-**sutādibhiḥ tad-ijyārthaiḥ tato yā cātmaiṣaṇā
**ātma**-pakṣa-pāta-rūpā yā ca lokaiṣaṇā
loka-dvaya-vaśīkaraṇecchā-rūpāvaśiṣṭā tāṁ ca he **deva**! **kālena**
sarveṇaivāvasareṇa \[pathi\] tad-ijyaikānusandhānatayā tad arthīkṛtena
devasya bhagavataḥ **kālena** tad-ijyaikānusandhāna-maya-samaya-gamanena
vā visṛjet tyaktum arhaḥ syāt budho vivekī evaṁ vittavato gṛhasthasya
tataḥ pūrva-vikṣiptamanas tvena śravaṇādikam api suṣṭhu na siddhyed iti
bhāvaḥ \| ata eva \[grāma ity ardhakam\] **grāme** gṛhāśrame
eṣaṇākṣayābhāvenāviraktasya haṭhāt-tyāge\'pi
śravaṇa-mananādi-niṣṭhatvā-siddhes tad anantaram eva tyājyam iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** vittaiṣaṇām ity-ādikaṁ
tādṛśa-bhagavaj-janādhikāri-sampādanāyoktam \|\|38-65\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** niṣkāmatvaṁ vinā
karma-nirhāro na syāt niṣkāmatvaṁ cānena prakāreṇa bhavedity
āhuḥ---**vittaiṣaṇāṁ** vittākāṅkṣāṁ yajñair dānaiś ca
vitta-phala-bhūtais tyajet \| sampāditeṣu yajñeṣu dāneṣu kim ataḥ paraṁ
vittena iti bhāvayet \| **gṛhair** gṛhocitair bhogair
**dāra**-sutaiṣaṇāṁ strī-sambhoga-vāsanāṁ putra-vāsanāṁ ca tyajet \| tad
anubhavenaiva tad autsukya-nivṛtteḥ dehe mṛte saty ātmanaḥ
sva-rgādi-**lokaiṣaṇāṁ** **kālena** kṣayānusandhānena visṛjet \|
**deva** he vasudeva! atrācāraṁ pramāṇayati-grāma iti \|\|38\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.39 \|\|**

ṛṇais tribhir dvijo jāto devarṣi-pitṛṇāṁ prabho \|

yajñādhyayana-putrais tāny anistīrya tyajan patet \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kiṁ ca, ṛṇair iti \| tathā ca
śrutiḥ, jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇas **tribhir** ṛṇavā jāyate brahmacaryeṇa
ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ ity-ādi \| **tāny
anistīrya** teṣām ṛṇāny anapākṛtya \| tathā ca manuḥ,

> ṛṇāni trīṇy apākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet \|
>
> anapākṛtya mokṣaṁ tu sevamāno vrajaty adhaḥ \|\| \[manu 6.35\] iti
> \|\|39\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atra saṅgatārtham
āha---kiṁ ceti \| anṛṇaḥ iti śruti-śeṣa-padaṁ jñeyam smṛtir apy atra
pramāṇaṁ, tathā ceti \| apākṛtya dūrīkṛtya \| mokṣe mokṣa-mārge
saṁnyāsādau \| adho vrajati devādīnāṁ kopān narakaṁ gacchatīty arthaḥ
\|\|39\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** kiṁ ca, ṛṣi-pitṝṇām
adhyayana-putrābhyām iva yajñena devānām ṛṇa-śodhanam avaśya-kṛtyam
evety āhuḥ---ṛṇer iti \| **prabho**! he sarva-rṇādi-mocana-samartha !
ity aśaktasya na tad-doṣāvaham iti sūcitam \| pitṛṇām iti hrasvatvam
ārṣam \| **tān** devādīn **anistīrya** **pated** yaḥ \| kiṁ vā, punar
gṛha-bhogādau praviśed ity arthaḥ \| pāṭhāntare\'pi sa evārthaḥ \| idaṁ
teṣām asammataṁ lakṣyate teṣām iti vyākhyānāt \|\|39\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : prabho**! he
sarva-rṇa-mocana-samartha! ity aśaktasya na doṣāvaham iti sūcitam \|
**pitṛṇām** iti hrasvatvam ārṣam \| **tān** devādīn **anistīrya,** tān
iti pāṭhe sa evārthaḥ \| devādi-padānām api tat-tad-ṛṇe tātparyāt
**patet** ubhayato bhraśyet vighnākulo bhaved ity arthaḥ \| ata eva
vrajaty adha \[manu 6.35\] iti manuḥ \| atra bhagavad-āśrayatvaṁ tu
noddiṣṭam iti tatra na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ \| **devarṣi**-bhūtāpta-nṛṇāṁ
pitṛṇām \[bhā.pu. 11.5.41\] ity-ādeḥ \|\|39\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** kiṁ ca, ṛṇair iti \|
tathā ca śrutiḥ---jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇas **tribhir** ṛṇavān jāyate
brahma-caryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ ity-ādiḥ \|
**tāny anistīrya** teṣām ṛṇāny anapākṛtya \|\|39\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.40 \|\|**

tvaṁ tv adya mukto dvābhyāṁ vai ṛṣi-pitror mahā-mate \|\|

yajñair devarṇam unmucya nirṛṇo'śaraṇo bhava

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nirṛṇo nirmukta-ṛṇaḥ \| aśaraṇo
**bhava** gṛhāt pravraja \|\|40\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** śaraṇaṁ gṛharakṣitroḥ
ityamaraḥ \| na vidyate śaraṇaṁ yasya saḥ \| etenarṇāpākaraṇaṁ vinā
gṛhasthatvatyāgo\'nucita ity uktam \|\|40\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tu-śabdo viśeṣe tam
evāhuḥ---**vai** eva dvābhyām ṛṇābhyāṁ mukta eva adyonmucya uccairmuktvā
nirasya nirṛṇaḥ san aśaraṇaḥ akāro viṣṇuḥ śravaṇādinā tad ekāśrayo
**bhava** \|\|40\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tu-śabdo viśeṣe tam
evāhuḥ-**vai** eva dvābhyām ṛṇābhyāṁ mukta eva \| adyonmucya uccair
muktvā nirasya nirṛṇaḥ san aśaraṇo **bhava** **tvaṁ** tu tyāgam api
viṣṇv arthaṁ kurv ity arthaḥ \|\|40\|\|

**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** dvābhyām ṛṇābhyām aśaraṇo
**bhava** gṛhāt pravraja \|\|40\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.84.41 \|\|**

va[^128]sudeva bhavān nūnaṁ bhaktyā paramayā harim \|

jagatām īśvaraṁ prārcaḥ sa yad vāṁ putratāṁ gataḥ \|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kiṁ ca aviśuddha-cittānām ayaṁ
kramaḥ, tvaṁ tu kṛtārtha evety āhuḥ, vasudeveti \| **bhavān** **nūnaṁ**
niścitaṁ **paramayā** prema-lakṣaṇayā **bhaktyā** **harim** \|
prārcotavān \| yad yasmāt \| **vāṁ** yuvayoḥ \|\|41\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** na tvām uddiśyaitad uktam
ity āha---kiñceti \| **prārcaḥ** arcitavānasi \| sa hariḥ \|
**yad-**yataḥ \| kim-bhūtas tvam-bhaṁ kalatraṁ tad asyāstīti **bhavān**
sakalatra ity arthaḥ \| kalatroḍutejasi syādbhaṁ bho bhrātari bhāskare
iti niruktiḥ \| vām ity uktir apy evaṁ saṅgacchate \| prārca ity
anadyatanātītavācinā laḍā bahūni janmāni sūcitāni \| bahūnāṁ janmanām
ante jñānavān māṁ prapadyate \[gītā. 7.19\] iti gītokteḥ \|\|41\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) : vasudeva** **bhavān**
nūnam ity-ādi---yat yo **vāṁ** yuvayoḥ **putratāṁ** **gataḥ**, taṁ
**jagatām īśvaraṁ** **paramayā** **bhaktyā** prāccaḥ prakarṣeṇa
arcitavān \|\|41\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** iyantu sādhakānāṁ
rītiruktā \| bhavāṁstu prathamata eva parama-kṛtārtha ity
āhuḥ---vasudeveti \| sattvaṁ viśuddhaṁ **vasudeva-**śabditam \[bhā.pu.
4.3.23\] ity-ādi-śrī-mahā-devoktānusāreṇa śuddha-sattva-svarūpatayā
viśuddha-cittatvādikam abhipretam \| yad vā, vasu
bhagavad-bhakti-lakṣanaṁ dhanam, tena dīvyatīti tathā, tat-sambodhanam
\| tad eva darśayati---**bhavān** iti \| **nūnaṁ** niścaye \| harī
sarva-doṣa-duḥkhaharam \| yato jagatāṁ devādīnām **īśvaraṁ** prakarṣeṇa
